mod.name: The Abyssal
mod.credits: Basemod, ModTheSpire, StSLib, Playtesting: Vex'd, Laertes, Arch. Art: Jessparro
mod.description: Adds The Abyssal as a new playable character.

relics.name: Gunsmith's Bible
relics.description: Right click to permanently replace this with a Cannon Trinket Relic, based on your current Act.
relics.flavorText: Waiting until later Acts grants progressively stronger Cannon Trinket Relics.

relics.name: Money Bag

relics.name: Bottled Void

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.

keywords.name: Bleeding
keywords.description: At the end of your turn, lose HP equal to half your Bleeding (round up), and then reduce your Bleeding by that amount.

keywords.name: Bury
keywords.description: Select a card from your draw pile and discard it.

keywords.name: Corrupt Artifact
keywords.description: Prevents the next buff that would be applied to target.

keywords.name: Dig
keywords.description: Return a card from your discard pile to your hand and upgrade it.

keywords.name: Ink
keywords.description: The next time this enemy would deal damage, prevent damage equal to the ink value, deal that much damage to the enemy, and then remove that much ink.

keywords.name: Thepirate:keyword
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.

keywords.name: Lure
keywords.description:
While this is in your deck, it's associated Predator card will always spawn in non-boss card rewards that have at least 1 rare.
When the corresponding Predator card is added to your deck, remove this from your deck.
Can only spawn from combat card rewards.

keywords.name: Mysterious
keywords.description: This card cannot be upgraded outside of combat.

keywords.name: Predatory
keywords.description:
If your deck contains the associated Lure card, always spawns in non-boss card rewards that have at least 1 rare. Cannot spawn through any other method.
When added to your deck, the corresponding Lure is removed.

keywords.name: Purge
keywords.description: Permanently remove this card from your deck.

keywords.name: Storm
keywords.description: Play a copy of this card for each previous card played this turn (you can't take damage while playing copies).

keywords.name: Volatile Ink
keywords.description: Ink is removed from enemies at the end of turn instead of during damage (benefits multi-attacks).
